mapper.select: select Xyjb from dwa_base_xyxx where nsrsbh = #{nsrsbh} order by Nd desc limit 1
select Xyjb from dwa_base_xyxx where nsrsbh = #{nsrsbh} order by Nd desc limit 1,1
select count(1) from dwa_base_djxx where nsrsbh = #{nsrsbh} and nsrlx like '%一般纳税人%'
select DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(max(sssqz),'1970-01-01'), '%Y-%m-%d') AS "sssqz" from dwa_base_sbxx where nsrsbh = #{nsrsbh} and zsxmdm = '10101' and rptflg in ('M', 'Q')
select count(1) from dwa_base_wfwzxx where SSWFXWCLZT_DM!='38' and NSRSBH=#{nsrsbh} and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, DJRQ,sysdate())>=3
select count(1) from dwa_base_wfwzxx where SSWFXWCLZT_DM='38' and NSRSBH=#{nsrsbh} and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, DJRQ,sysdate())>=3

select ifnull(sum(lrze),0) as "lrze" from (select case when kjzdzz_dm = '201' then bys when kjzdzz_dm = '102' then byje when kjzdzz_dm = '101' then bqje else 0 end as lrze from dwa_base_lrbxx where nsrsbh = #{nsrsbh} and substr(SSQZ, 1, 4) =#{lastyear} and TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, SSQQ,Ssqz)>=360 ) a

select sum(Qmye_Qy) from dwa_base_zcfzxx where nsrsbh = #{nsrsbh} and Qyxmmc like '所有者权益%' and TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, SSQQ,Ssqz)>=360 and (substr(SSQQ, 1, 4) = #{lastyear} or substr(SSQQ, 1, 4) = #{beforlastyear})

select ifnull(sum(bnljje), 0) from dwa_base_lrbxx where nsrsbh = #{nsrsbh} and hmc like '%、净利润%' and TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, SSQQ,Ssqz)>=360 and (substr(SSQQ, 1, 4) = #{lastyear} or substr(SSQQ, 1, 4) = #{beforlastyear})
select DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(max(sssqz),'1970-01-01'), '%Y-%m-%d') AS "sssqz" from dwa_base_sbxx where nsrsbh = #{nsrsbh} and zsxmdm = '10104' and rptflg ='Q'
select Max(ssqz) from dwa_base_zcfzxx t where nsrsbh =#{nsrsbh} order by ssqz desc

select ifnull(tax2YNetAss,0) from (select ifnull(qmye_qy, 0) + ifnull(ncye_qy, 0) as tax2YNetAss from dwa_base_zcfzxx t where nsrsbh =#{nsrsbh} and qyxmmc like '所有者权益%' and ssqz=#{endDate} order by ssqz desc, ssqq asc limit 1) a
select Max(ssqz) from dwa_base_lrbxx t where nsrsbh=#{nsrsbh} order by ssqz desc

select ifnull(tax2YPro,0) from (select ifnull(bqje, 0) as tax2YPro from dwa_base_lrbxx t where hmc like '%、净利润%' and nsrsbh = #{nsrsbh} and ssqz in (#{endDate}, #{endDate1}) and ssqq in (#{startDate}, #{startDate1}) and bnljje is null order by ssqz desc, ssqq asc limit 1 ) a
select count(1) from HSYH_FPXX_HCFPHZ a where nsrsbh=#{nsrsbh} and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, kprq,sysdate())<=13 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, kprq,sysdate())>0 and zfbz='Y'
select ifnull(sum(je)+sum(se),0) from HSYH_FPXX_HCFPHZ a where nsrsbh=#{nsrsbh} and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, kprq,sysdate())<=13 and TIMESTAMPDIFF(MONTH, kprq,sysdate())>0 and zfbz='Y'
